sourcesContent:
Contacts

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Contact } from '../contact.model'; import { ContactService } from '../contact.service'; @Component({ selector: 'cms-contact-list', templateUrl: './contact-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./contact-list.component.css'], }) export class ContactListComponent implements OnInit { contacts: Contact[] = []; constructor(private contactService: ContactService) {} ngOnInit() { this.contacts = this.contactService.getContacts(); this.contactService.contactChangedEvent.subscribe( (contacts: Contact[]) => { this.contacts = contacts; } ); } }
